title: Falsam Judaeorum Opinionem De Spiritu Sancto, Expendit Et Reiicit Idque Ad Illustris Collegii Groeningiani Civium Fidem Excitandam Et Vitam Piam Formandam. In Festo Pentecostes MDCCXXX. Publice Proponit Daniel Godofr. Werner, Illustris Collegii Groeningiani Rector Et Professor
